\newcommand{\otts}{

\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottsym{put(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{)}} {\textsf{M}}{}{}{\ottcom{PutStore}}}

\newcommand{\ottvd}{

\newcommand{\otte}{

\newcommand{\ottm}{

\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{e}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Expression}}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{\ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{VarDeclaration}}}

\newcommand{\ottT}{

\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottkw{number}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{Number}}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\ottG}{
\ottrulehead{\Gamma}{::=}{\ottcom{Context}}\ottprodnewline
\ottfirstprodline{|}{\varnothing}{}{}{}{\ottcom{EmptyContext}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \Gamma  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{SingletonContext}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \Gamma  \cup  \Gamma' }{}{}{}{\ottcom{UnionContext}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{id}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{ContextItem}}}

\newcommand{\ottR}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{R}}{::=}{\ottcom{Relations}}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\ottEq}{

\ottfirstprodline{|}{\ottnt{Eq} \, \ottnt{R} \, \ottnt{Eq'}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{com Equality}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{C}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{ConstraintFormula}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\Gamma}{}{}{}{\ottcom{ContextFormula}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottnt{X}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{VariableFormula}}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\ottC}{
\ottrulehead{\ottnt{C}}{::=}{\ottcom{Constraint}}\ottprodnewline

\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{C}  \cup  \ottnt{C'} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{UnionConstraint}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{C}  \cap  \ottnt{C'} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{IntersectConstraint}}\ottprodnewline
\ottprodline{|}{\ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{Eq}  \ottsym{\}}}{}{}{}{\ottcom{ConstraintEquation}}\ottprodnewline

\newcommand{\ottX}{

\ottprodline{|}{ \ottnt{X}  \cup  \ottnt{X'} }{}{}{}{\ottcom{UnionVariable}}\ottprodnewline

%% defn reduce
\newcommand{\ottdruleseqOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{e} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{e} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{seq1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleseqTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \langle  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle }%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{e'_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{e_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{seq2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleassignOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \langle  \ottnt{e} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{e'} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle }%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e'} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{assign1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleassignTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{v} ,  \ottsym{put(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{v}  \ottsym{)}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{assign2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulederef}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottnt{id} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottsym{get(}  \ottnt{s}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{)} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{deref}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevarOne}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle   \epsilon  ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{var1}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevarTwo}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \langle  \ottnt{e} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{e'} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle }%
}{
 \langle  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e'} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{var2}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevarThree}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{v} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle   \epsilon  ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{var3}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevarFour}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \langle  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{vd'} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd}  \ottsym{;}  \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd'} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle }{%
{\ottdrulename{var4}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnreduce}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \langle  \ottnt{m} ,  \ottnt{s}  \rangle  \rightarrow  \langle  \ottnt{m'} ,  \ottnt{s'}  \rangle $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleseqOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleseqTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleassignOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleassignTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulederef{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarOne{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarTwo{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarThree{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevarFour{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXnum}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{n}  :  \ottkw{number} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_num}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXbool}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{b}  :  \ottkw{boolean} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_bool}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXstring}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{str}  :  \ottkw{string} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_string}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXundefined}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{undefined}  :  \ottkw{undefined} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_undefined}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdrulevXXnull}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{null}  :  \ottkw{null} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{v\_null}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSkipTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash    \epsilon   :  \ottkw{undefined} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{SkipTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIdType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\Gamma  \ottsym{(}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{)}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{T}}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \varnothing  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,  \Gamma }{%
{\ottdrulename{IdType}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleIdTypeUndef}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{\ottnt{id} \,  \notin  \, \ottsym{dom(}  \Gamma  \ottsym{)}}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,   \Gamma  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{IdTypeUndef}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleAssignType}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}    \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}    \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} \, \ottsym{=} \, \ottnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{\}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{AssignType}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnexpType}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma' $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevXXnum{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevXXbool{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevXXstring{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevXXundefined{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdrulevXXnull{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSkipTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleIdType{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleIdTypeUndef{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleAssignType{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}

%% defn typable
\newcommand{\ottdruleDecTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  } \hspace{3pt} \varnothing ,   \Gamma  \cup  \ottsym{\{}  \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{:}  \ottnt{T}  \ottsym{\}}  }{%
{\ottdrulename{DecTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleExpTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma' }%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{e}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma' }{%
{\ottdrulename{ExpTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleSeqTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \ottsym{;}  \ottnt{m_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{SeqTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleDefTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  :  \ottnt{T} \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{id}  \ottsym{=}  \ottnt{e}  \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{DefTypable}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\ottdruleMultiDecTypable}[1]{\ottdrule[#1]{%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \Gamma_{{\mathrm{1}}}   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd'}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}} ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }%
\ottpremise{ \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cap  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \, \ottsym{=} \, \varnothing}%
}{
 \Gamma   \vdash   \ottkw{var} \, \ottnt{vd}  \ottsym{,}  \ottnt{vd'}  \hspace{5pt}| _{   \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{X_{{\mathrm{2}}}}   } \hspace{3pt}  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \cup  \ottnt{C_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  ,  \Gamma_{{\mathrm{2}}} }{%
{\ottdrulename{MultiDecTypable}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\ottdefntypable}[1]{\begin{ottdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma   \vdash   \ottnt{m}  \hspace{5pt}| _{  \ottnt{X}  } \hspace{3pt} \ottnt{C} ,  \Gamma' $}{}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleDecTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleExpTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleSeqTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleDefTypable{}}
\ottusedrule{\ottdruleMultiDecTypable{}}
\end{ottdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\ottdefnsJop}{
\ottdefnexpTypeTwo{}\ottdefnConstraintEq{}\ottdefnreduce{}\ottdefnexpType{}\ottdefntypable{}}

\newcommand{\ottdefnss}{
\ottdefnsJop
}

\newcommand{\ottall}{\ottmetavars\\[0pt]
\ottgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\ottdefnss}

\begin{document}
\ottall

\begin{verbatim}
Definition rules:        23 good    0 bad
Definition rule clauses: 41 good    0 bad
\end{verbatim}
\end{document}
